popup_copy_tooltip_contents_copy.message: Copy the contents of QR Code

popup_cam_status_no_cam_permission.message:
No camera permissions. 
Please allow camera permissions from the site settings on the chrome side.

permissions_cam_access_permission.message: To read the QR code, you must have permission to access the camera. Click on "Allow" in the upper left corner.

permissions_cam_access_granted.message:
Camera access granted! 
Close this page and scan the QR code!

permissions_cam_access_blocked.message:
Access to the camera has been blocked. 
Please allow camera permissions from the site settings on the chrome side.
